column4: if I upgraded from Hardy to Intrepid, how can I fix my third party sources for Intrepid.
you'll need to edit your /etc/apt/sources.list as root.  when you see a third party  repo, replace the word Hardy by Intrepid (all lowercase please) then do update and upgrade
Oh great, doesn't seem to hard. Thanks a bunch
yeah really ^^ let me know if you need anything
